A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Went opening night and I think this one really missed the mark. I went into this this thinking it would be as epic as the last two. 

Seems to me this was a filler-from the fake looking porgs\, some parts with bad acting and the cheesy jokes I give this a 3/5. The opening fight scene was like every other Star Wars. An x wing 
shooting at an Empire ship. There wasn't much suspense and I knew what was going to happen next. Disney is also babying down Star Wars way too much. It just felt like something major was missing from this one\, something that production might have cut out and shouldn't have. It didn't flow and didn't seem like JJ's working.
 
It is theater worthy though\, as it would get an even lower score from me if watched at home.
